attributes.action: ask HM Queen to dissolve parliament and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent signs of corruption and mayhem in this current parliament, we the people no longer have confidence in this parliament. We also have no confidence in it's ability to represent the people and complete the duties and responsabilities which we asked it to undertake.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
